title: Mixed Reality-Based STEAM Mathematics Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (functions, geometry, statistics) and proficiency in basic smartphone operations
context.additional_context: Exploring mathematical concepts through an ecological psychology approach via XR-based experiential learning in a constrained technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Students can spatially visualize mathematical concepts using extended reality (XR) technology and explain them in connection with real ecological environments.
Students can present solutions to mathematical problems that integrate artistic elements (design, modeling) while conducting team projects via PBL.
Students can analyze XR experience data, interpret mathematical reasoning processes through an ecological psychology framework, and submit findings in report form.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
